comment: The worst professor I had while at KSU. She doesn't care about her students, only about the way teaching makes her look. I wouldn't not suggest anyone take her.

Dr. Cone is my favorite professor. Her expectations for each assignment are explained both in her syllabus and during class. You cannot make it up though, you have to do the work and you need to get on it from the beginning. Her coursework is difficult and it is group work, so be sure to stay in contact about any issues. She'll help you. READ!
Dr. Cone is an excellent professor.  Her enthusiasm for attracting diverse students to the STEM fields is contagious.  Be prepared, her expectations are high but she will not let you fail.

Extremely intimidating! However, her class is very interactive and fun, and you will learn a ton about how to teach Science. Her assignments are pretty minimal, and they are all relevant to the subject. No textbooks!:) She posts articles on Vista.
